amendment.description: To clarify the responsibilities of the Directorate of Intelligence of the National Counterterrorism Center for information-sharing and intelligence analysis.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3750 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3750 proposed by Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S10219-10220; text: CR S10219-10220) To clarify the responsibilities of the Directorate of Intelligence of the National Counterterrorism Center for information-sharing and intelligence analysis.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3750 proposed by Senator Roberts.
